inscope.li: Geometry used in the construction of shape representations

uof.name: Construction_Geometry
uof.description: The Construction_Geometry UoF provides for construction geometry that is not necessarily part of the shape definition.

If the constructive_geometric_element is an oriented edge or an oriented face.
If the constructive_geometric_element is a face that is defined by an associated surface.
